description: Try our easy to follow Roast Chicken with Fruity Stuffing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Chicken with Fruity Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup herbs, chopped (or 2 tsp dried mixed herbs)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Tear buns into chunks. Place in a bowl with milk and set aside for 5 minutes to soften.

Meanwhile, heat 20g of the butter in a small frying pan. Add onion and garlic and cook for 5-6 minutes or until softened. Add to the soft bread with the herbs, lemon zest and remaining 60g of butter. Season with salt and pepper. Stir well to combine.

Fill chicken cavity with stuffing mixture. Tie legs together with kitchen string. Place chicken, breast-side up, in a roasting pan. Season with salt and pepper. Cook for 1 hour 15 minutes or until golden and cooked when tested with a skewer. Carve chicken and serve.
